Represents information pertaining to the particulars of certificate by director and/ or secretary after having made due inquiries Certify that category of Company Exempted from beneficial owner reporting

Represents information pertaining to the particulars of certificate by director and/ or secretary after having made due inquiries Certify that The company has the following status relating to its director

Represents information pertaining to the particulars of certificate by director and/ or secretary after having made due inquiries certify that the company has not since date of the incorporation of the company issued any invitation to the public to subscribe for any shares in or debentures of the company or to deposit moneys for fixed periods or payable at call.

Represents information pertaining to the particulars of certificate by director and/ or secretary after having made due inquiries certify that the company has not since the date of the last annual return issued any invitation to the public to subscribe for any shares in or debentures of the company or to deposit moneys for fixed periods or payable at call.

Represents information pertaining to the particulars of certificate by director and/ or secretary after having made due inquiries certify that the company is a public company which has more than five hundred members and the company provides reasonable opportunities and facilities for a person to inspect and take copies of its list of members and its particulars of shares transferred.

Represents information pertaining to the particulars of certificate by director and/ or secretary after having made due inquiries certify that the excess of members of the company above fifty (counting joint holders of shares as one person) consists only of persons who are in the employment of the company or of its subsidiary or persons who while previously in the employment of the company or of its subsidiary were and thereafter have continued to be members of the company.

Represents information pertaining to the particulars of certificate by director and/ or secretary after having made due inquiries certify having made an inspection of the share register, that transfers have/ have not been registered since date of the last annual return.

Represents information pertaining to the particulars of certificate by director and/ or secretary after having made due inquiries certify having made an inspection of the share register, that transfers have/ have not been registered since the incorporation of the company.

Represents information pertaining to the particulars of certificate by director and/ or secretary after having made due inquiries certify that the provisions of the Unclaimed Moneys Act 1965, relating to the unclaimed moneys have/ have not been complied with in relation to the company.

Represents information pertaining to the particulars of certificate by director and/ or secretary after having made due inquiries Certify that the status relating to the beneficial owner(s) of the company is as follows
